com.techgrains.util

Class TGUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.techgrains.common.TGObject
      • com.techgrains.util.TGUtil

  • public class TGUtil
extends TGObject
    Utility class for TGFramework library, which includes date parsing and formatting.
